meanings.definition: A person who makes a will.
meanings.sent1: The testator carefully wrote down their wishes in the will.
meanings.sent2: After his passing, the testator's will was read to the family.
meanings.sent3: The testator joked that even in death, they would have the last say.
meanings.sent4: The testator's will stood as a silent witness to their final decisions.
meanings.sent5: The testator's will was like a roadmap guiding their loved ones after they were gone.

meanings.definition: One who dies having made a will.
meanings.sent1: The testator's family gathered to honor their memory after their passing.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer confirmed that the deceased was indeed the testator of the will.
meanings.sent3: Despite being gone, the testator's will continued to speak for them.
meanings.sent4: The testator's presence was felt in the words of the will they left behind.
meanings.sent5: The testator's legacy lived on through the will they left for their loved ones.
